definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions

sentences.english: The sun blistered the paint on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下墙上的油漆起气泡了。

sentences.english: Golden, with a very fine cordon of bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色的酒液，还有精致的小气泡。

sentences.english: High viscosity oils produce foam with small bubbles that do not break easily.
sentences.chinese: 高粘度油产生泡沫的小气泡，不容易突破。

sentences.english: Fold proper air cap with bubble facing outer into the bottom of the box.
sentences.chinese: 对叠好适量的气泡垫放入箱底，气泡面朝外。

sentences.english: Fold proper air cap with bubble facing outer into the bottom of the box.
sentences.chinese: 对叠好适量的气泡垫放入箱底，气泡面朝外。

sentences.english: Use of ultrasonic energy forces to dissolve CO2 into gas bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 利用超声波能将二氧化碳分解成气泡。

sentences.english: Here's a close up of these chokes, notice the bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 这有些生锈电感的近照，注意那些气泡。

sentences.english: A cloud is like the bubbles in a soft drink, but in reverse.
sentences.chinese: 云就像汽水中的气泡，但情况相反。

sentences.english: To navigate you have to drag the bubble upon the layout.
sentences.chinese: 你要浏览时只需拖动布局上的气泡。

sentences.english: Downstream of the valve's pressure increases, the cavitation bubble crush process process.
sentences.chinese: 阀下游的压力升高，压破气泡的过程即空化过程。

sentences.english: Foam rubber is soft rubber full of small air-bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫橡胶是充满了小气泡的软橡胶。

sentences.english: When morning came, the mermaid turned into a water bubble and went up to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 到了早晨，把水变成了美人鱼和气泡上升到天堂。

sentences.english: Of glass or quartzite marred by small bubbles or small particles of foreign material.
sentences.chinese: 被小气泡或者异质材料的小微粒所损害。

sentences.english: Pearl outer membrane, lined with bubble film.
sentences.chinese: 外层为珠光膜，内衬为气泡膜。

sentences.english: Even witches appreciate what they bring to a boiling cauldron.
sentences.chinese: 就连巫婆都喜欢沸腾着的冒着气泡的大锅。

sentences.english: Wrap an inner box with two pieces of air cap & into carton.
sentences.chinese: 用两块气泡垫将一个内盒裹住后并放入外箱中。

definition: to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
